preqs: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {MED3051}.

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {4531, 4532, 4533, M6011, M6018, M6019}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {MED3051}

description: MED3062 is an integrated medicine/surgery curriculum based on the four themes of the medical curriculum: personal and professional development; population, society, health and illness; foundations of medicine; and clinical skills. Evidence-based educational approaches support students in acquiring appropriate knowledge, attitudes and skills in medicine, surgery, clinical skills, evidence-based clinical practice, occupational and environmental medicine, patho-physiology, pharmacology, ethics and law. Previous learning will be extended. By the end of the semester students must be capable of undertaking history and clinical examinations of patients with straightforward conditions.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
